verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David. A Song.) Let God <WH430> arise, <WH6965> let His enemies <WH340> be scattered; <WH6327> And let those who hate <WH8130> Him flee <WH5127> before <WH4480> <WH6440> Him.

As smoke <WH6227> is driven <WH5086> away, <WH5086> [so] drive <WH5086> [them] away; <WH5086> As wax <WH1749> melts <WH4549> before <WH4480> <WH6440> the fire, <WH784> [So] let the wicked <WH7563> perish before <WH6> <WH4480> God. <WH6440>
But let the righteous <WH6662> be glad; <WH8055> let them exult <WH5970> before <WH6440> God; <WH430> Yes, let them rejoice <WH7797> with gladness. <WH8057>

Sing <WH7891> to God, <WH430> sing <WH2167> praises <WH2167> to His name; <WH8034> Lift <WH5549> up [a song] for Him who rides <WH7392> through the deserts, <WH6160> Whose name <WH8034> is the Lord, <WH3050> and exult <WH5937> before <WH6440> Him.
A father of the fatherless <WH1> and a judge <WH3490> for the widows, <WH1781> Is God <WH490> in His holy <WH430> habitation. <WH6944>

God <WH430> makes <WH3427> a home <WH1004> for the lonely; <WH3173> He leads <WH3318> out the prisoners <WH615> into prosperity, <WH3574> Only <WH389> the rebellious <WH5637> dwell <WH7931> in a parched <WH6707> land. <WH6707>
O God, <WH430> when Thou didst go <WH3318> forth <WH3318> before <WH6440> Thy people, <WH5971> When Thou didst march <WH6805> through the wilderness, <WH3452> Selah. <WH5542>

The earth <WH776> quaked; <WH7493> The heavens <WH8064> also <WH637> dropped <WH5197> [rain] at the presence <WH6440> of God; <WH430> Sinai <WH5514> itself <WH2088> [quaked] at the presence <WH6440> of God, <WH430> the God <WH430> of Israel. <WH3478>
Thou didst shed <WH5130> abroad <WH5130> a plentiful <WH5071> rain, <WH1653> O God; <WH430> Thou didst confirm <WH3559> Thine inheritance, <WH5159> when it was parched. <WH3811>
Thy creatures <WH9130> settled <WH3427> in it; Thou didst provide <WH3559> in Thy goodness <WH9186> for the poor, <WH6041> O God. <WH430>
The Lord <WH136> gives <WH5414> the command; <WH561> The women who proclaim <WH1319> the [good] tidings <WH1319> are a great <WH7227> host: <WH6635>
"Kings <WH4428> of armies <WH6635> flee, <WH5074> they flee, <WH5074> And she who <WH9317> remains <WH9317> at home <WH1004> will divide <WH2505> the spoil! <WH7998>"

When <WH518> you lie <WH7901> down <WH7901> among <WH996> the sheepfolds, <WH9630> [You are like] the wings <WH3671> of a dove <WH3123> covered <WH2645> with silver, <WH3701> And its pinions <WH84> with glistening <WH3422> gold. <WH2742>
When the Almighty <WH7706> scattered <WH6566> the kings <WH4428> there, It was snowing <WH7949> in Zalmon. <WH6756>
A mountain <WH2022> of God <WH430> is the mountain <WH2022> of Bashan; <WH1316> A mountain <WH2022> [of many] peaks <WH1386> is the mountain <WH2022> of Bashan. <WH1316>

Why <WH4100> do you look <WH7520> with envy, <WH7520> O mountains <WH2022> with [many] peaks, <WH1386> At the mountain <WH2022> which God <WH430> has desired <WH2530> for His abode <WH3427>? Surely, <WH637> the Lord <WH3068> will dwell <WH7931> [there] forever. <WH5331>
The chariots <WH7393> of God <WH430> are myriads, <WH7239> thousands <WH8136> upon thousands; <WH505> The Lord <WH136> is among them [as at] Sinai, <WH5514> in holiness. <WH6944>

Thou hast ascended <WH5927> on high, <WH4791> Thou hast led <WH7617> captive <WH7617> [Thy] captives; <WH7628> Thou hast received <WH3947> gifts <WH4979> among men, <WH120> Even [among] the rebellious <WH5637> also, <WH637> that the Lord <WH3050> God <WH430> may dwell <WH7931> [there.]
Blessed <WH1288> be the Lord, <WH136> who daily <WH3117> bears <WH6006> our burden, <WH6006> The God <WH410> [who] is our salvation. <WH3444> Selah. <WH5542>
God <WH410> is to us a God <WH410> of deliverances; <WH4190> And to God <WH3068> the Lord <WH136> belong escapes <WH8444> from death. <WH4194>
Surely <WH389> God <WH430> will shatter <WH4272> the head <WH7218> of His enemies, <WH340> The hairy <WH8181> crown <WH6936> of him who goes <WH1980> on in his guilty <WH817> deeds. <WH817>
The Lord <WH136> said, <WH559> "I will bring <WH7725> [them] back <WH7725> from Bashan. <WH1316> I will bring <WH7725> [them] back <WH7725> from the depths <WH4688> of the sea; <WH3220>
That your foot <WH7272> may shatter <WH4272> [them] in blood, <WH1818> The tongue <WH3956> of your dogs <WH3611> [may have] its portion <WH4521> from [your] enemies. <WH340> "
They have seen <WH7200> Thy procession, <WH1979> O God, <WH430> The procession <WH1979> of my God, <WH410> my King, <WH4428> into the sanctuary. <WH6944>
The singers <WH7891> went <WH6923> on, the musicians <WH5059> after <WH310> [them], In the midst <WH8432> of the maidens <WH5959> beating <WH8608> tambourines. <WH8608>
Bless <WH1288> God <WH430> in the congregations, <WH4721> [Even] the Lord, <WH3068> [you who are] of the fountain <WH4726> of Israel. <WH3478>

There <WH8033> is Benjamin, <WH1144> the youngest, <WH6810> ruling <WH7287> them, The princes <WH8269> of Judah <WH3063> [in] their throng, <WH7277> The princes <WH8269> of Zebulun, <WH2074> the princes <WH8269> of Naphtali. <WH5321>
Your God <WH430> has commanded <WH6680> your strength; <WH5797> Show <WH5810> Thyself strong, <WH5810> O God, <WH430> who <WH2098> hast acted <WH6466> on our behalf.
Because <WH4480> of Thy temple <WH1964> at Jerusalem <WH3389> Kings <WH4428> will bring <WH2986> gifts <WH7862> to Thee.

Rebuke <WH1605> the beasts <WH9130> in the reeds, <WH7070> The herd <WH5712> of bulls <WH47> with the calves <WH5695> of the peoples, <WH5971> Trampling <WH7511> under foot <WH7511> the pieces <WH7518> of silver; <WH3701> He has scattered <WH967> the peoples <WH5971> who delight <WH2654> in war. <WH7128>
Envoys <WH2831> will come <WH857> out of Egypt; <WH4714> Ethiopia <WH3568> will quickly <WH7323> stretch <WH7323> out her hands <WH3027> to God. <WH430>
Sing <WH7891> to God, <WH430> O kingdoms <WH4467> of the earth; <WH776> Sing <WH2167> praises <WH2167> to the Lord, <WH136> Selah. <WH5542>

To Him who rides <WH7392> upon the highest <WH8064> heavens, <WH8064> which are from ancient <WH6924> times; <WH6924> Behold, <WH2005> He speaks <WH5414> forth <WH5414> with His voice, <WH6963> a mighty <WH5797> voice. <WH6963>
Ascribe <WH5414> strength <WH5797> to God; <WH430> His majesty <WH1346> is over <WH5921> Israel, <WH3478> And His strength <WH5797> is in the skies. <WH7834>

O God, <WH430> [Thou art] awesome <WH3372> from Thy sanctuary. <WH4720> The God <WH410> of Israel <WH3478> Himself <WH1931> gives <WH5414> strength <WH5797> and power <WH8592> to the people. <WH5971> Blessed <WH1288> be God! <WH430>
